thread.title: Dulac man guilty in fatal shooting of shrimp boat captain
thread.title_full: Dulac man guilty in fatal shooting of shrimp boat captain - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Dulac man guilty in fatal shooting of shrimp boat captain
text:
HOUMA, La. (AP) - A 32-year-old Dulac man has been found guilty in the fatal shooting of a Vietnamese shrimp boat captain three years ago after a two-day trial.
The Courier reports ( http://bit.ly/1LRJRkD ) Richard Verdin was convicted of the second-degree murder of 49-year-old Vo Hung, of Houma, on June 24, 2012 at the Bayou Grand Caillou dock.
Verdin faces mandatory life in prison without probation or parole.
The jury voted 10 to 2 Thursday night after about three hours of deliberation.
Information from: The Courier, http://www.houmatoday.com
